case.title: big beautiful girl looking... - 30 (london)
case.text:
Big beautiful white girl in her 30s...
looking for a white guy.... Age 25-40
to have fun with to cuddle to talk on the phone to text late at night to have long walks at the park to talk about everything
and nothing...
He should be single He should be kind He should be well mannered well then... he should be mine!
